alert.note: Alert for Warren (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 20 at 10:24AM EST until February 22 at 1:30AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR AN ICE JAM NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam continues. * WHERE...A portion of eastern New York, including the following county, Warren. * WHEN...Until 1230 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1020 AM EST, local emergency manager reported that the Route 418 (River Street) between Hickory Hill Road and River Road remains closed in both directions in the adjoining towns of Warrensburg and Thurman due to flooding from an ice jam. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Warrensburg, Thurman Station and Athol. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
